definitions.text: give entirely to a specific person, activity, or cause
examples: She committed herself to the work of God
give one's talents to a good cause
consecrate your life to the church

definitions.text: set aside or apart for a specific purpose or use
examples: this land was devoted to mining

definitions.text: (followed by `to') dedicated exclusively to a purpose or use
examples: large sums devoted to the care of the poor
